summary: British flying aces in World War I contend with the harsh realities of war.

Richardson|John Rodion|Speirs Ruskell|Tom Seidel|John Sutton|F. Philip Sylvestre|Gordon Thorpe|Charles Waldron Jr.|Gordon Wallace|Norman Willis|Gilbert Wilson
title: The Dawn Patrol
